notes.text:
Slice beef against the grain for tenderness
Cook on very high heat for best results
Don't overcrowd the wok

steps.descr: Marinate beef in soy sauce and cornstarch for 10 minutes

on_enter.say: Right, let's marinate our lovely beef in soy sauce and cornstarch. Give it a good mix and let it sit for 10 minutes to soak up all those flavours.

steps.instructions: Marinate beef in soy sauce and cornstarch for 10 minutes

steps.descr: Heat wok or large pan on high heat

on_enter.say: Let's get that wok nice and hot! Crank up the heat and wait until it's almost smoking. This is key for a great stir-fry!

steps.instructions: Heat wok or large pan on high heat

steps.descr: Stir-fry beef in batches until browned, set aside

on_enter.say: Now, let's stir-fry our beef in batches. Listen for that sizzle and aim for a beautiful brown colour. Once done, set it aside.

steps.instructions: Stir-fry beef in batches until browned, set aside

steps.descr: Add vegetables and garlic, stir-fry for 3 minutes

on_enter.say: Time to add our vibrant veggies and garlic. Stir-fry them for about 3 minutes until they're just tender but still have a bit of crunch.

steps.instructions: Add vegetables and garlic, stir-fry for 3 minutes

on_enter.say: Let's bring that beef back into the mix. Add it to the wok with the veggies.

steps.descr: Add oyster sauce and a splash of water

on_enter.say: Now, let's add that rich oyster sauce and a splash of water to bring everything together. Give it a good stir!

steps.instructions: Add oyster sauce and a splash of water

steps.descr: Toss everything together and serve over rice

on_enter.say: Finally, give everything a good toss to combine all those lovely flavours. Serve it over some fluffy rice and enjoy!

steps.instructions: Toss everything together and serve over rice

recipe.title: Beef Stir Fry
recipe.description: Quick Asian-style stir fry with tender beef and crisp vegetables
